description: Join San Francisco pig boy Joshua Adams in one of the best scenes of his young career! Rick Gonzales was not scheduled to work with Joshua, but as soon as they met we knew we had to make room for a luscious fuck between them. They were all up for it and we started rolling the cameras! Rick fucks Joshua in several stunning positions, each faithfully captured for your enjoyment by the Raging Stallion film team. Soon Michael Brandon joins the scene, and the fucking causes so much heat that we had to make sure the fire extinguishers were at the ready! Ok guys, this one you have to see for yourselves ? words will not describe the sex that took place that day. All we can say is this ? this is one of the best performances of Michael Brandon's career!
title: Party In The Rear, Scene #05
